transArray.content: Although it is a 3-star hotel, it is no worse than other so-called 5-star hotels. To be honest, the only thing is that the room is a bit small, it's okay for one person, but it's very crowded for two. Others are very good, service facilities and so on are full marks. It's a pity that I went out at 5 o'clock the next morning and didn't have a chance to try breakfast. I don't think it will let me down. live again next time
